anniemookerji: This post..... To be very honest, I started following you on Insta very recently, like a couple days ago recently.. But now I understand why @shayan_roy or @srishtipatch posted things about you the way they did.. Your everyday stories or posts like these talk about the ugly, gritty, honest everyday life and the mental (and/or physical) situation we carry or experience every single day.. This particular post actually brought tears to my eyes coz of the immense and hard truth it held.. I speak for myself when I say that sooo many times I feel I lead a meaningless life. Nothing new happens.. I sit n smile n laugh n be cheerful but CANNOT show my sadness or pain outside.. I feel a pressure coz everybody knows me as this "happy-go-lucky", extrovert person n I feel like I have to carry out this facade for them n for me coz showing any other emotion would act as a betrayal.. So I go on smiling.. I become honest with everything else... Just. Not. This.
